column5: Pete has been pretty darn busy during the first week of Muskie season! Check out some of his recent accomplishments - 1 of the Top 20 Anglers on the Planet, The Next Bite wins "Best Overall Outdoor Fishing Program, Top 5 Finalist for 'Best On Air Talent'... Not too shabby for a crazy muskie angler who wears pink hats!  http://www.petemaina.com/pages/press-release.php
heck of a week for sure!  Congrats Pate!  *note to self, get a pink hat and Green Bay glasses and I'll catch the BIG ones fort sure*
Ahhh heck, I knew you'd be a shoo-in, Pete. If you need any more guidance, you have my number.
